Name: Shuffs
About the game: Shuffs is a physics-based puzzle game which makes use of platforming controls as a means of manipulating your environment through the use of whatever projectiles you can find. Armed with nothing but a bindle and your own resourcefulness, set off on a journey full of head-scratching puzzles, action-packed boss fights and funky stunt shots. Master your control over such projectiles as frogs, rats, and spiders, each with different effects and behaviours to learn. Face up against a series of hair-tearing puzzles and trick shots, designed to turn you into the biggest badass a straw-stuffed, little dummy can be. Hone your skills across 38 levels and 24 unlockable bonus levels, throughout farms, swamps and derelict industrial estates, ridden with a gang of cockroaches known as the Pink Eye Boys. To complete the story can take as little as 3-4 hours, but it's a tough game, so you'll probably end up getting much more than that out of it. But most of all, just have fun. You're probably not gonna be good at this right away.* *See a doctor if you are good at this right away, 'cause you are totally sick, yo!
